sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.ui.checklist" name="Checklist" state="published" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true"> <description>Checklists that can be associated with tables/records</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/> <import plugin="com.glide.rest.service"/> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="ChecklistApi" class="com.glide.ui.checklist.ChecklistService" /> <extension point="com.glide.css.checklist" name="styles/css_includes_checklist.css" /> <extension point="com.glide.scripts.checklist" name="scripts/js_includes_checklist.js" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="inline_checklist_processor" class="com.glide.ui.checklist.InlineChecklistProcessor" /> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Checklists that can be associated with tables/records</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.ui.checklist</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Checklist</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.ui.checklist/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.ui.ng,com.glide.rest.service</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.ui.checklist</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
